text: @kimguilfoyle @realDonaldTrump @RepLeeZeldin I live in south Louisiana, worked in the oil field for 41 years. Just curious if our government is going to bail us out, like they did the airlines?  Like Scott Warner said on the halftime report coronavirus is no fault of Oilfield. My community is hurting. Just being fair.
